  • Constructor Details

    • Island

      public Island(int position, int dimension)
      Parameters:
      position - position of the island (must be 0 <= position < GameConstants.NUMBER_OF_ISLANDS)
      dimension - the dimension of the island (must be 1 < dimension <= GameConstants.NUMBER_OF_ISLANDS)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the position is invalid or the dimension is not positive

  • Method Details

      public int getDimension()
      Get the dimension of the group to which the island belongs
      Returns:
      the dimension of the island group

    • isBefore

      public boolean isBefore(Island island)
      An island is considered before another island when its position is right before the position of the other island. If this island has a dimension greater than one, this island is before another if its (position + dimension) is right before the position of the other island. NB: Islands are positioned in a circular list, so you must also perform the operations using the modulo operator.
      Parameters:
      island - the island to check this island against.
      Returns:
      true if this island is before the given island, false otherwise.

    • getTowerType

      public Tower getTowerType()
      Return the tower type for this Island
      Returns:
      the tower type
      Throws:
      TowerNotSetException - if the tower type hasn't been set yet

    • receiveTower

      public void receiveTower(Tower tower)
      Add a tower to the island. The first tower received determines the tower type for this island.
      Specified by:
      receiveTower in interface TowerReceiver
      Parameters:
      tower - the tower to receive
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if the number of tower is greater than the island dimension or if a tower with a different type is added
